data.comment: The match has started at São Januario.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
In the minute 1, Free kick Flamengo.
Cayo Tenorio (Vasco da Gama) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 2, Bruno Henrique is back on the pitch.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Bruno Henrique for Flamengo who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Flamengo have a dangerous throw-in.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 4, Gerson (Flamengo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 7, Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
Vasco da Gama take a 1-0 lead thanks to Talles Magno.
In the minute 9, Cayo Tenorio with an assist there.
Throw-in for Flamengo in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 11, Diego (Flamengo) has received a first yellow card.
Ball goes out of play for a Flamengo goal kick.
At São Januario, Flamengo are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 15, It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a Vasco da Gama throw-in in Flamengo's half.
In the minute 18, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
Flamengo drive upfield and Bruno Henrique gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Vasco da Gama defender.
Flamengo are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 20, Ball safe as Flamengo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Flamengo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half?
Flamengo to take a throw-in in Vasco da Gama territory.
In the minute 21, Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Flamengo.
In the minute 23, Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a throw-in for Flamengo, close to Vasco da Gama's area.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards Vasco da Gama a goal kick.
In the minute 24, Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Martin Benitez is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 26, Matheus Franca is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Can Flamengo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half?
Flamengo's Matheus Franca is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 29, Martin Benitez returns to the field for Vasco da Gama after picking up a slight injury.
Vasco da Gama have a goal kick.
Free kick in a good position for Vasco da Gama!
In the minute 32, Martin Benitez for Vasco da Gama drives towards goal at São Januario. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
In the minute 33, Flamengo's Diego gets in a shot on goal at São Januario. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Flamengo in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Free kick for Flamengo in the half of Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 36, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama.
Throw-in Flamengo.
Important block from the Vasco da Gama defence as Bruno Henrique fires in a strike for Flamengo.
In the minute 38, Willian Arao for Flamengo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
Martin Benitez gets his shot on target but fails to score for Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 41, Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
Vasco da Gama awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
In the minute 44, Free kick for Vasco da Gama in the half of Flamengo.
Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vasco da Gama push upfield but Flavio Rodrigues de Souza quickly pulls them for offside.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Flamengo just outside Vasco da Gama's area.
In the minute 45, Diego (Flamengo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Flamengo.
Flamengo's Matheus Franca breaks free at São Januario. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Vasco da Gama goal kick.
The first-half has ended.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards the home team a throw-in.
Vasco da Gama advance rapidly upfield but Flavio Rodrigues de Souza blows for offside.
Throw-in for Flamengo close to the penalty box.
In the minute 47, Flamengo are in shooting range from this free kick.
Leo Pereira (Flamengo) nets with a header to make it 1-1 at São Januario.
That's a fine assist from Diego.
In the minute 49, Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
Leandro Castan (Vasco da Gama) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Free kick Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 50, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 52, Talles Magno for Vasco da Gama has been booked by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza and receives a first yellow card.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a Flamengo throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 56, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Flamengo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 57, Vasco da Gama to take a throw-in in Flamengo territory.
Throw-in for Flamengo in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
In the minute 59, Bruno Henrique (Flamengo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In Rio de Janeiro Flamengo drive forward through Pedro. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for Flamengo in their own half.
In the minute 61, Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Thiago Maia (Flamengo) has received a yellow card from Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
In Rio de Janeiro, Carlinhos of Vasco da Gama is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 62, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama.
Vasco da Gama's Martin Benitez misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 64, Free kick Vasco da Gama.
Ball safe as Flamengo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in high up the field for Flamengo in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 67, In Rio de Janeiro Vasco da Gama attack through Carlinhos. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Flamengo at São Januario.
Michael is replacing Diego for the away team.
In the minute 69, Vasco da Gama awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Flamengo to take a throw-in in Vasco da Gama territory.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards Vasco da Gama a goal kick.
In the minute 70, Goal! Bruno Henrique gives Flamengo a 1-2 lead.
Thiago Maia instrumental with a fine assist.
Corner awarded to Flamengo.
In the minute 73, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
At São Januario, Bruno Henrique has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Vinicius is on a sub for Cayo Tenorio for Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 74, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards the away team a throw-in.
Vasco da Gama push forward at São Januario and Andrey gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Flamengo defence.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 77, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
Vasco da Gama's Talles Magno gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 78, Flamengo have a goal kick.
Throw-in Vasco da Gama.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a Flamengo throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half.
In the minute 80, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards Vasco da Gama a goal kick.
Vasco da Gama's Carlinhos gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Flamengo defender.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Flamengo in their own half.
Free kick for Flamengo in the half of Vasco da Gama.
The home team replace Talles Magno with Guilherme Parede.
In the minute 84, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a Vasco da Gama throw-in in Flamengo's half.
German Cano of Vasco da Gama smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 85, Guilherme Parede of Vasco da Gama is pulled up for offside.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 88, Goal kick for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in the half of Flamengo.
Flamengo's Leo Pereira has been booked in Rio de Janeiro.
Marcos Junior (Vasco da Gama) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Flamengo goal kick.
Free kick Vasco da Gama.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
Gabriel Pec (Vasco da Gama) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
Ball safe as Vasco da Gama is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza will wait an extra 7 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Free kick Vasco da Gama.
Can Vasco da Gama get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Flamengo's half?
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-2.
Flamengo make their second substitution with Vitinho replacing Gerson.
Vitinho for Flamengo has been booked by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza and receives a first yellow card.
The home team have replaced Marcos Junior with Gabriel Pec. This is the third substitution made today by Ramon Menezes.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Bruno Henrique.
Lincoln (Flamengo) has replaced the possibly injured Bruno Henrique.
